welcome_message_body: Welcome to Las Pinas City, where the rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality await you. Explore the city's famous bamboo organ, delicious local cuisine, and charming neighborhoods – we hope you enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
